creator: Alexander.Frink@accenture.com
text:
I tried to configure RollingFileAppender to use an unlimited number of
backup files (e.g. to archive them by a separate process). Naively 
I used setMaxBackupIndex(Integer.MAX_VALUE) and wondered why my
program did not respond any longer. The source code reveils that it is
tried to rename all possibly existing log files starting at MAX_VALUE-1
down to 1. A useful enhancement would be to first check the highest
used log file index with a while (file.exists()) loop starting at index 1.
Alternatively a warning in the APIDoc would be nice.
Unlimited number of backup will be considered in log4j 1.3.
